pr_title: Add kotlin extension for interaction with Context in coroutines.

timeline.message: Add kotlin extension for interaction with Context in coroutines.

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should prefix this with Kotlin or Coroutine to make reading code usages super clear about which context we're referring to.
timeline.author: jkwatson

timeline.bodyText: similarly, I might call this field otelContext or openTelemetryContext for extra clarity.
timeline.author: jkwatson

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should also mention that many async framework users won't want to use this either. Even if we don't have a drop-in solution for them.
timeline.author: jkwatson
